actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to move amphetamines and certain other stimulant substances from schedule III of such act to schedule II.

summary.text: Moves, under the Controlled Substances Act, amphetamines, phenmetrazine, methamphetamine, and methylphenidate from schedule III of such Act to schedule II.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to move amphetamines and certain other stimulant substances from schedule III of such act to schedule II.
